      class  CubicBezier
      A Bezier curve defined by two anchor points and two control points.
      class  Ellipse
      An ellipse, analgous to Processing's ellipse() function.
      class  Flower
      A flower-like pattern made from two sinusoidal motions of different frequencies.
      class  Gesture
      Like a Shape but with temporal information attached to each vertex.
      class  InfinitySymbol
      An infinity symbol.
      class  Line
      A line in 2D space.
      class  Lissajous
      A complex form created by two sinusoidal motions.
      class  Plot
      An x/y plot of data.
      class  Rect
      A rectangle, analgous to Processing's rect() function.
      class  Segment
      A subpath of a parent Path.
      class  Shape
      A sequence of vertices attached by lines, analogous to using Processing's beginShape(), vertex(), and endShape() functions.
      class  Superellipse
      A more generalized version of the ellipse.
      class  Supershape
      A more generalized version of the superellipse
